snippet: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner has been told by doctors to take a month off because of a subdural hematoma on her brain, her spokesman said.
abstract: Argentine Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is told by doctors to take month off after recently suffering a head injury.
lead_paragraph: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner has been told by doctors to take a month off because of a subdural hematoma on her brain, her spokesman said.
